pullrequest.title: Fix seeking back in time in log playback

content.raw:
This didn't work, should it?

1. Load `log_record_dbl_pendulum.sdf` (which records by default)
1. Delete the pendulum
1. Close the simulator - log file is saved to `/tmp/log`
1. Playback the logged file, i.e. `ign gazebo -p /tmp/log`
1. Wait for the pendulum to disappear
1. If I rewind, the pendulum shows up: `ign service -s /world/default/playback/control --reqtype ignition.msgs.LogPlaybackControl --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 5000 --req "rewind: true, pause: false"`
1. But if I seek to a time before the pendulum was deleted, but not exactly the beginning of simulation, the pendulum doesn't show up. For example: `ign service -s /world/default/playback/control --reqtype ignition.msgs.LogPlaybackControl --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 5000 --req "seek: {sec: 10}, pause: false"`
